name: JointCreationMode

  The way joints are created between two surfaces.

  The way joints are created between two surfaces.

items:
  - name: All
    summary: |
      Joints are created between any kind of surface. Functions identically to
      Surface.

  - name: Surface
    summary: |
      Joints are created between any kind of surface. Functions identically to

  - name: None
